column4: pls can anyone help me with using my usb on ubuntu linux, it keeps disconnecting after a few seconds when ever i connect
pls can anyone help me with using my usb modem on ubuntu linux, it keeps disconnecting after a few seconds when ever i connect
wait a half hour or so, before repeating questions.  every 2 minutes is WAY too often, wait for different people to join/pay-attention ;)  best of luck.
